mapper.select: SELECT QNA_BNO, M.MEMBER_NO, M.NICKNAME, P_BNO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_DATE, QNA_DEPTH, QNA_AREA, COUNT FROM QNA_BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' START WITH P_BNO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR QNA_BNO = P_BNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY QNA_BNO ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_BOARD(QNA_BNO, MEMBER_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_AREA) VALUES (SEQ_QNA_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaArea})
